para.text: In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
Terms Defined.
"Department" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Medical Assistance Program" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Medical Care Programs" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Medicare" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Program" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Provider" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.
"Recipient" has the meaning stated in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Licensing Requirements.
section.text: Providers shall meet all licensing requirements as set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Conditions for Participation.
section.text: To participate in the Program, the provider shall:

para.text: Comply with the conditions for participation as set forth in COMAR 10.09.36;
Be approved as a provider of ambulance services by Medicare.

section.heading: Covered Services.
section.text: The program covers copayment and deductible payments for Medicare-approved services to Maryland Medical Assistance recipients.

section.heading: Limitations.
section.text: The Program does not cover any payment for service other than coinsurance and deductible as approved by Medicare.

para.text: Payment procedures for this chapter are set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.
The Department will authorize payment on Medicare ambulance claims if:
The provider accepts Medicare assignments;
Medicare makes direct payment to the provider;
The services are covered by the Program;
Initial billing is made directly to Medicare according to Medicare guidelines;
Medicare has determined that services were medically justified.
The Department will make supplemental payment on Medicare ambulance claims, subject to the following conditions:
Deductible insurance will be paid in full;
Coinsurance will be paid in full.
Billing time limitations for claims submitted pursuant to this chapter are set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Recovery and Reimbursement.
section.text: Recovery and reimbursement for this chapter are set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Cause for Suspension or Removal and Imposition of Sanctions.
section.text: Cause for suspension or removal and imposition of sanctions for this chapter are set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Appeal Procedures.
section.text: Appeal procedures for this chapter are set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.

section.heading: Interpretive Regulation.
section.text: The interpretive regulation for this chapter is set forth in COMAR 10.09.36.
